Comments_List: Overview of some ethical questions in Biology
The strength is that different lectures were led by different PIs that are experts in the field. They can share their own experiences with us.

Strengths: Many classes were conversation based rather than just a professor talking.

Weaknesses: Slow or stilted conversation in many classes. Professors could encourage students more to discuss between themselves.

Frequently canvas notifications were not sent out when reading for classes was uploaded, leading to many classes where students did not know there was set reading and therefore came unprepared. Please always notify us via canvas or email when there is reading to do.

Final paper seems like a pointless exercise given that the students are not debating the topics of the papers after they are written.
Yes, I will. It is a must for us to know what is defined as scientific misconduct and how to avoid that.
